sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular hexagon has a side length of 8 meters. What is the perimeter of the hexagon?
message_2:
A regular hexagon has 6 equal sides. To find the perimeter, simply multiply the side length (8 meters) by the number of sides (6).

Perimeter = 8 meters Ã— 6 = 48 meters
